channel.title: 命令 - 标签 - YYT6801's Blog
channel.description: 命令 - 标签 - YYT6801's Blog

item.title: CMD 常用操作
item.author: YYT6801
item.description: autoIP.bat @echo off cd /d %~dp0 %1 start "" mshta vbscript:createobject(“shell.application”).shellexecute("""%~0""","::",,“runas”,1)(window.close)&exit netsh interface ip set address name=“以太网” source=dhcp netsh interface ip set address name=“WLAN” source=dhcp renewIP.bat ipconfig/flushdns ipconfig/release ipconfig/renew pause 设置以太网Ip为10.20.32.247.bat netsh interface ip set address name=以太网 source=static addr=10.20.32.247 mask=255.255.255.0 pause 设置无线网wlan的Ip为_10.20.32.252.bat netsh interface ip set address name=WLAN source=static addr=10.20.32.252 mask=255.255.255.0 pause 修改路由表到192.168.1.1.bat cd /d %~dp0 %1 start "" mshta vbscript:createobject(“shell.application”).shellexecute("""%~0""","::",,“runas”,1)(window.close)&exit route add 10.151.18.86 192.168.1.1 route add 10.151.18.218 192.168.1.1 route add 10.
